body.para: The -undeclared option tells the compiler to enable the support for 'undeclared variables'.
+ | - Specifying +, or just -undeclared, directs the compiler to enable the support for 'undeclared variables'
This will NOT work with the Core and Vulcan dialects.
When the compiler detects an 'unknown identifier', it will assume that this is either a field in the current work area or a memory variable.
The compiler option will only have effect when you also enabled -memvar.
